channel.title: Code is slightly off

item.title: Code is slightly off
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay. I’m a bit fuckered up. So this will sound confusing.

The interafeace you currently have shoring, it is trying to load something that doesn’t exist.
The null tab is the theressa’s shop.
So basically edit the RSInterface in the client and make sure the interface is loading all images and the correct abmount of images properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Code is slightly off
item.dc:creator: @zRickyz zRickyz
item.description:
@zRickyz wrote:

Alright so I’m adding a new monster teleport interface and somewhere it must be off slightly because when I go to the second teleport page it has Thessalia’s Makeovers [Legs] interface lol. and since the code for that is 0 it must just be off a little somewhere. I can’t seem to find the spot maybe one of you guys have a better eye. Cheers

[code]//Monster Teleports Start
case 132211:
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2676, 3715, 0);

		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		}
		break;
	case 132214:
		c.getPA().spellTeleport(2884, 9798, 0);
		
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		}
		break;
	case 132217:
		c.getPA().spellTeleport(3428, 3537, 0);
		
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		}
		break;
	case 132220:
		c.getPA().spellTeleport(2710, 9466, 0);
		c.sendMessage("You have teleported to Brimhaven Dungeon, be sure to bring an antifire-shield!");
		
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); //Lunar
		}
		break;
		
	case 132227:
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); //Lunar
		}
		break;
		
	case 132230:
		c.setSidebarInterface(6, 39000);
		break;
		
	case 152099:
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); //Lunar
		}
		break;
	case 152102:
		c.setSidebarInterface(6, 34000);
		break;
		
	case 152091:
		c.getPA().spellTeleport(3109, 9832, 0);
		
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
		} else {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		}
		break;
		
	case 152094:
		c.getPA().spellTeleport(2327, 9899, 0);
		
		if(c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		} else if(c.playerMagicBook == 1){
			c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient

	//Monster Teleports end[/code]
